content.rendered:
My people, let the curry cult awaken your senses and feed your souls. Raise up your forks and join us! Behold our latest work for McDonnells Curry sauce and find out the Secret to Fullfullment!

Ooooohh!

We finally lift the lid on the underground practices of the McDonnells curry cult and those that give themselves openly to a life filled with Chippus Currius and finding “The Secret of Fullfullment“.
